tDCS_on_first_day.Description: Specifies which tDCS polarity participants received on the first lab visit (anodal or cathodal). Participants visited lab twice in total (separated by about a week). On the second visit, they received the opposite polarity (cathodal or anaodal).

Levels.anodal: anodal tDCS applied on the first lab visit; cathodal tDCS applied on the second
Levels.cathodal: cathodal tDCS applied on the first lab visit; anodal tDCS applied on the second

age.Description: age of the participant (at the time of data acquisition)

gender.Description: gender of the participant (at the time of data acquisition)
